title: Vegetation Fire Prompts Evacuations in Laguna Beach Area: OCFA
content: A wind-driven vegetation fire has forced the evacuation of residents from the Top of the World neighborhood in Laguna Beach, according to officials.    A vegetation fire burns near the Laguna Beach area on June 2, 2018. (Credit: Orange County Fire Authority)     The so-called Aliso Fire is burning below the Top of the World area and behind Soka University of America, the Orange County Fire Authority stated on Twitter.    At least 25 acres have burned, officials said.    Check back for updates on this developing story.   33.542719  -117.785357
